metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23942 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: The Nextcloud Desktop Client is a tool to synchronize files from aNextcloud Server with your computer. Versions prior to 3.6.3 are missingsanitisation on qml labels which are used for basic HTML elements such as`strong`, `em` and `head` lines in the UI of the desktop client. The lackof sanitisation may allow for javascript injection. It is recommended thatthe Nextcloud Desktop Client is upgraded to 3.6.3. There are no knownworkarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
